head.title: DEVILS' PARTIAL SQUAD FALLS TO BRUINS

hedline.hl1: DEVILS' PARTIAL SQUAD FALLS TO BRUINS

block.p: The Devils suffered a 2-1 preseason loss to the Boston Bruins last night in Albany, home of the New Jersey's top affiliate in the minor leagues.

Steve Kelly scored the Devils' goal in the second period and Chris Terreri allowed both Boston goals in 40 minutes of action. Frederic Henry replaced Terreri to start the third period and stopped all 10 shots he faced.
The Devils suffered a 2-1 preseason loss to the Boston Bruins last night in Albany, home of the New Jersey's top affiliate in the minor leagues.

Steve Kelly scored the Devils' goal in the second period and Chris Terreri allowed both Boston goals in 40 minutes of action. Frederic Henry replaced Terreri to start the third period and stopped all 10 shots he faced.

The team's assistant coaches, Slava Fetisov and Kurt Kleinendorst, staged drills at South Mountain Arena in West Orange, N.J., with a group that did not play against the Bruins. The group included Martin Brodeur, Scott Stevens, Scott Gomez, Patrik Elias, Alexander Mogilny and Brian Rafalski.
